ISSUE.TITLE: Support array in .drone.yml config
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently map is used to specify steps and map doesn't guarantee order. So it would be nice to support syntax with an array like this: ```yaml pipeline: - name: backend image: golang commands: - go build - go test - name: frontend image: node commands: - npm install - npm run test - npm run build ```
